bioprojects.title: Mycobacterium tuberculosis Genome sequencing and assembly

assembly_info.submitter: Borneo Medical and Health Research Centre

description.title: Pathogen: clinical or host-associated sample from Mycobacterium tuberculosis
description.comment: M. tuberculosis was isolated from the screening program in Sabah, Malaysia. The chest X-ray was performed during the screening and collected the sputum for candidate abnormal x-ray. The sputum was tested through the GeneXpert MDR/RIF and the isolate that identify as positive M. tuberculosis was sub-cultured using BACTEC MGIT 320 Culture system, prior to whole genome sequencing. The tests confirmed the sample is M. tuberculosis positive from the GeneXpert MDR/RIF. The study is going deep to the mutation of through the bioinformatic analysis

owner.name: Borneo Medical and Health Research Centre

assembly_info.comments:
Bacteria and source DNA available from Universiti Malaysia Sabah
The annotation was added by the NCBI Prokaryotic Genome Annotation Pipeline (PGAP). Information about PGAP can be found here: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/genome/annotation_prok/

bioprojects.title: Mycobacterium tuberculosis strain:AY1MRC Genome sequencing and assembly

description.title: M. tuberculosis: clinical isolate sample from TB patient
description.comment: M. tuberculosis isolated and identified from pulmonary TB patient in Jazan region Saudi Arabia, sets out to: describe their genetic heterogeneity, explore their phylogenetic positioning , and to identify which variations (i.e. insertions and deletions) are characteristic to it.

attributes.name: note
attributes.value: Originally submitted as Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex sp. AY1MRC but changed in June 2020 because of ANI results to Mycobacterium tuberculosis

attributes.name: host_description
attributes.value: Sputum sample was collected from 23 years old male, suspected of having pulmonary tuberculosis, the sample was confirmed for the presence of M. tuberculosis by direct ZN stain, IS6110 insertion gene, Hsp65, GeneExpert MTP/RIF, and sub-cultured on LJ medium . Typical growth of M. tuberculosis complex was discovered in LJ medium, from which DNA isolated for whole genome sequencing. GeneExpert MTP/RIF was positive with RIF sensitive MTB.

assembly_info.comments: The organism was changed from "Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex sp. AY1MRC" to "Mycobacterium tuberculosis" in June 2020.
